title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, October 5, 2020
description: It's the birthday of Czech activist-turned-president Václav Havel (1936-2011), who said, "The solution to the situation does not lie in leaving it."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of Czech activist-turned-president Václav Havel (1936-2011), who said, "The solution to the situation does not lie in leaving it."
